name: Stellar Winds University Instance
description:
Play Modes Overview

Made with Unity3D, an arcade sci-fi space fighter game with three play modes. Stellar Winds is an Indie Game developed by a group of University Students as their final project which offers around 1-2 hours of gameplay. 

Master ship movement and combat as you employ your own strategies to escape a supernova or save your space station from a relentless force. Beat your high score and become a part of the next phase of development

Controls

WASD - Ship Thrust
L Alt - Move Down
Space - Move Up
Q/E - Rotate
Mouse - Look
Z - Toggle Inertia Dampeners
F - Toggle View
L Ctrl - View Rear

Left Click - Fire Weapon

Made By

Callum Nottage
Karamu Poutama
James Osborn
Matthew Payne
Chavva Te Amo
Cassandra  Odierna
